location.title: Location
location.description: Our wedding will take place in the beautiful gardens of Elegant Gardens. The venue features stunning outdoor spaces perfect for both ceremony and reception, with elegant indoor areas for dining and celebration.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.a1: The ceremony will begin at 4:00 PM.
ceremony.a2: Formal attire is requested. For gentlemen, a suit or tuxedo. For ladies, cocktail dresses or formal gowns.
ceremony.a3: Yes, there is complimentary parking available on-site for all guests.

wedding.title: Wedding Reception
wedding.a1: The reception will begin immediately after the ceremony, around 5:30 PM.
wedding.a2: Yes, we will be serving a three-course dinner with vegetarian options available.
wedding.a3: Yes, you can find our gift registry information on the RSVP page.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.a1: Yes, we have arranged special rates at several nearby hotels. Details will be provided in your invitation.
accommodation.a2: Yes, shuttle service will be available between the hotels and venue.
accommodation.a3: Standard check-in time is 3:00 PM at all partner hotels.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: We've created a special photo gallery where you can view and share your favorite moments from our wedding. The gallery will be available during and after the event, allowing you to capture and share your memories with us.

tables.title: Table Assignment
tables.description: Enter your name to find your assigned table for the reception. We've carefully arranged the seating to ensure everyone has a great time!
tables.notFound: Table not found. Please check your name or contact the organizers.
